mapper.sql: id, type_code, type_name, item_code, item_value, item_sort, item_remark, item_css, delete_flag
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict_item (type_code, type_name, item_code, item_value, item_sort, item_remark, item_css, delete_flag) values (#{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemCss,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y')
mapper.update: update sys_dict_item set type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_name = #{typeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_value = #{itemValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_sort = #{itemSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, item_remark = #{itemRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, item_css = #{itemCss,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_dict_item where type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_flag = 'Y' order by item_sort

select
from sys_dict_item where type_code=#{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and item_code=#{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_flag = 'Y'
